last_episode_to_air.name: Ascension (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: The battle against Apocalypse rages as X-Men, the Brotherhood, and Acolytes join forces to stop him from turning all humans into mutants.

name: X-Men: Evolution
overview: Teenagers Cyclops, Jean Grey, Rogue, Nightcrawler, Shadowcat, and Spike fight for a world that fears and hates them.

episodes.name: Strategy X
episodes.overview: Mystique sees an opportunity to get a spy in Xavier's institute when the morally shady Todd Tolanski starts exhibiting mutant powers. Kurt Wagner, Xavier's latest recruit, arrives and tries to familiarize himself with his new life as part of the X-Men.

episodes.name: The X-Impulse
episodes.overview: 15-year-old Kitty Pryde wakes up one day and finds herself able to walk though objects. She tries to ignore it, but finds that hard when she's approached by Jean Grey and a mutant trouble maker, who both say they know what she's going through and want to help her. Meanwhile Wolverine's old nemesis, Sabertooth, arrives in town - looking for trouble.

episodes.name: Rogue Recruit
episodes.overview: After being kept in the dark about her powers for years, a young female mutant touches a fellow student and absorbs his strength, his memories - his life. Afraid and confused, and unable to differentiate her memories from the absorbed ones she runs away - straight in to the hands of Mystique.

episodes.name: Mutant Crush
episodes.overview: The only thing bigger than Fred Dukes' strength and size, is his temper, which makes his first day at school rather difficult. When Jean Grey makes contact, trying to be friendly, he takes it just a bit to seriously.

episodes.name: Speed and Spyke
episodes.overview: Ororo's nephew starts exhibiting mutant powers, but he's more interested in settling a rivalry with a fellow mutant than hearing about a ""school for freaks"".

episodes.name: Middleverse
episodes.overview: Kurt accidently finds an abandoned lab, and is sucked into a pocket dimension by a strange device he finds there.

episodes.name: Turn of the Rogue
episodes.overview: Scott and Rogue end up on a geology club field trip together. Scott tries to be friendly to her, but it turns out Mystique has other plans...

episodes.name: SpykeCam
episodes.overview: As an extra credit project, Evan is given a camera to record the ""current events"" in his life. Though most of them aren't keen on being caught on tape, Sabertooth is most definitively interested in the result.

episodes.name: Survival of the Fittest
episodes.overview: While the X-Men are at a summer camp, learning survival training, Mystique releases Cain Marko - the unstoppable Juggernaut - in hopes of getting his help in obtaining Xavier's mutant location system.

episodes.name: Shadowed Past
episodes.overview: Rogue's nightmares seem to show images from Kurt's past, but in them he's far too young to remember. So where did they come from?

episodes.name: Grim Reminder
episodes.overview: A news report from the Canadian mountains triggers something deep inside Wolverine, and he starts having berserk fits. To find out why, he takes the Blackbird to the site, not knowing that Kitty and Kurt are sitting in the back.

episodes.name: The Cauldron (1)
episodes.overview: As mysterious metal pods appear, picking up the mutants one at a time, Cerebro detects a new mutant in Hawaii: Alex Summers - Scott's believed to be deceased brother.

episodes.name: The Cauldron (2)
episodes.overview: Magneto reveals the his plans for the winners of his challenge - to fully unlock their powers with a machine he has built. Back at the mansion, those left behind regroup, and decide to pay Magneto a little visit.

episodes.name: Growing Pains
episodes.overview: When Cyclops and Nightcrawler save people from a car crash they question Xavier's desire to keep their identities a secret. Meanwhile, the Brotherhood terrorize people in a crowded stadium.

episodes.name: Bada-Bing Bada-Boom
episodes.overview: Nightcrawler has a crush on a new student. The wild girl is grounded for breaking the rules, but things get worse when her father arrives and asks that she help him in a bank robbery.

episodes.name: Power Surge
episodes.overview: Jean's telepathy changes, arriving in surges she can't control; and Hank McCoy joins the faculty as a science-and-gym teacher.

episodes.name: Fun and Games
episodes.overview: The young X-Men are left alone in the mansion when the adults respond to a jailbreak, and they throw a party that doesn't end well.

episodes.name: The Beast of Bayville
episodes.overview: The serum Hank McCoy uses to control his mutation no longer works, and his students are afraid of his angry outbursts.

episodes.name: Adrift
episodes.overview: Havok is swept out to sea while surfing in Hawaii, and Scott saves him, but they both end up stranded and have to work together to survive.

episodes.name: African Storm
episodes.overview: The X-Men help Storm when her abilities are threatened by a visiting African witch doctor who attempts to steal her powers.

episodes.name: Joyride
episodes.overview: Avalanche wants to join the Institute, but has trouble being accepted by the others, especially after he's accused of taking joyrides on the X-vehicles at night.

episodes.name: On Angel's Wings
episodes.overview: Xavier suspects that a flying "angel" seen above New York is a mutant, and he sends Cyclops and Rogue to find him before Magneto does.

episodes.name: Mindbender
episodes.overview: Jean is possessed by a mutant with telepathic powers, which he uses to control the students and have them help him in his plot to release the imprisoned Apocalypse, a mutant who wishes to enslave the human race.

episodes.name: Shadow Dance
episodes.overview: Forge invents a teleporter, and Nightcrawler uses it to travel large distances, but inadvertently opens a portal that allows strange creatures to follow him back to the school.

episodes.name: Retreat
episodes.overview: Beast is mistaken for Bigfoot by hunters while he's on a camping trip with the students.

episodes.name: Walk on the Wild Side
episodes.overview: The women form a team of crime fighters after Jean and Amara are teased for having weaker powers, and they call themselves the Bayville Sirens.

episodes.name: Operation: Rebirth
episodes.overview: Magneto steals plans for a top-secret project that produced super soldiers. Wolverine worked on it during World War II.

episodes.name: The HeX Factor
episodes.overview: Mystique frees a mutant called the Scarlet Witch from an asylum, hoping she'll help the Brotherhood, but Mystique doesn't know the witch is seeking revenge on Quicksilver and Magneto.

episodes.name: Day of Reckoning (1)
episodes.overview: At Xavier's urging, the Brotherhood and the X-Men unite to battle Magneto; and the Institute begins to self-destruct while students are trapped in the mansion.

episodes.name: Day of Reckoning (2)
episodes.overview: A traitor in the battle threatens the efforts of the X-Men and the Brotherhood against Magneto, who has another secret weapon--the Sentinel robot.

episodes.name: Day of Recovery
episodes.overview: The X-Men and the Brotherhood rally after the mansion's destruction, and they try to find Xavier and the captured X-Men.

episodes.name: The Stuff of Heroes
episodes.overview: Cylops leads the X-Men in a search for the missing Xavier and Wolverine.

episodes.name: Mainstream
episodes.overview: The mutants' existence is no longer a secret, so Xavier has the X-Men and the Brotherhood return to school, but Principal Kelly has a surprise plan for the mutant students.

episodes.name: The Stuff of Villains
episodes.overview: The Brotherhood are expelled from school, and Magneto asks Gambit to bring them to him. He then sends them to rescue Wanda's brother from jail.

episodes.name: Blind Alley
episodes.overview: The destroyed Institute is restored by the X-Men; Mystique escapes and sets a trap for Cyclops.

episodes.name: X-Treme Measures
episodes.overview: Spyke gets hold of sports drink that harms mutants. Meanwhile, Kitty learns to drive, which terrifies her friends.

episodes.name: The Toad, The Witch, and The Wardrobe
episodes.overview: Wanda searches for Magneto while Toad steals Nightcrawler's holo-image inducer, hoping that, if he changes his appearance, he'll win over the Scarlet Witch.

episodes.name: Self Possessed
episodes.overview: Rogue has no control over her powers, and the powers of others that she has absorbed surface, including those of Sabretooth, and the X-Men must find a way to help her.

episodes.name: Under Lock and Key
episodes.overview: Mesmero returns and uses Gambit's powers to free Apocalypse.

episodes.name: X23
episodes.overview: Wolverine learns that he's been cloned by HYDRA scientists, and the clone targets Logan.

episodes.name: Dark Horizon (1)
episodes.overview: Mesmero tries to free Apocalypse once again and uses Rogue to help him, while the X-Men join forces with Magneto and the Acolytes to stop him.

episodes.name: Dark Horizon (2)
episodes.overview: Mesmero releases Apocalypse from his tomb and the X-Men, Brotherhood and Acolytes rush to the tomb to fight him.

episodes.name: Cruise Control
episodes.overview: The X-Men go on a cruise, then travel to an island when vacationers resent their abilities. But they face danger when the island's volcano erupts.

episodes.name: Impact
episodes.overview: The X-Men pursue Apocalypse in Mexico, hoping to find and overcome him before Magneto finds him.

episodes.name: No Good Deed
episodes.overview: The Brotherhood cause mishaps so they can stop them and appear to be heroes.

episodes.name: Target X
episodes.overview: Wolverine finds his clone, X-23, who's trying to destroy Hydra, her creator, and the two team up to complete the mission.

episodes.name: Sins of the Son
episodes.overview: Xavier is told he has a son, who has been kidnapped in Scotland. So he and the X-Men head there to find him.

episodes.name: Uprising
episodes.overview: Hate crimes against mutants in Bayville prompt Spyke to return to stop the violence.

episodes.name: Cajun Spice
episodes.overview: Rogue is kidnapped by Gambit, who says he's there to help her; and the X-Men search for her, led by Wolverine.

episodes.name: Ghost of a Chance
episodes.overview: Kitty is rescued by a mutant and invites her to join the institute. But the mutant soon vanishes, and only Kitty remembers her.

episodes.name: Ascension (1)
episodes.overview: Xavier finds Apocalypse in Egypt, and Apocalypse unleashes four horsemen, who battle the X-Men.

episodes.name: Ascension (2)
episodes.overview: The battle against Apocalypse rages as X-Men, the Brotherhood, and Acolytes join forces to stop him from turning all humans into mutants.
